name: labelspy-ocr
description: LabelSpy: Food label analyzer with Yandex Cloud Vision OCR

scripts.start: node -e "const http = require('http'); const handler = require('./api/ocr'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { if (req.method === 'POST' && req.url.startsWith('/api/ocr')) { let body = ''; req.on('data', d => body += d); req.on('end', () => { req.body = JSON.parse(body); handler(req, res); }); } else { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}); res.end(JSON.stringify({status: 'ok'})); } }); server.listen(process.env.PORT || 3000); "
scripts.dev: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const handler = require('./api/ocr'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { if (req.method === 'POST' && req.url.startsWith('/api/ocr')) { let body = ''; req.on('data', d => body += d); req.on('end', () => { req.body = JSON.parse(body); handler(req, res); }); } else { const file = path.join('./public', req.url === '/' ? 'index.html' : req.url); try { res.setHeader('Content-Type', req.url.endsWith('.json') ? 'application/json' : 'text/html'); res.end(fs.readFileSync(file)); } catch { res.statusCode = 404; res.end('Not found'); } } }); server.listen(3000, () => console.log('Dev server on :3000')); "
